original_title: UFC on ESPN 20: Chiesa vs. Magny
overview: UFC on ESPN 20: Chiesa vs. Magny was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on January 20, 2021, at the Etihad Arena on Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. A welterweight bout between The Ultimate Fighter: Live lightweight winner Michael Chiesa and Neil Magny served as the main-event.
title: UFC on ESPN 20: Chiesa vs. Magny
